data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Mexox-KMTWIQ7kNvgHPE6KG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAsSQj9sM0P2CasTxHPGnMMbco6ZH67r5DpcCNI5hc0sw&oe=666AD637)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1BpEDQ7ZZGwQ7kNvgFRHovM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCBXdyC1ENFlV2Me8sPJ-3S-F4Mm-D_lo7PxEbx8y2bIw&oe=666AE3D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iaVcZi8brTEQ7kNvgHhJjx3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDre50x1N86HOBy393tsIB3lZ31N9RZ2vqx6o8xjXIUZQ&oe=666ACF09)
